Reviews.Title: BEAUTIFUL
Reviews.Author: Nickp45j "Nick"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera with insane night vission in total darkness, so look no further. it comes with a great lens (fully controllable iris) !!!! it runs off 12vdc/24ac but dosn't come with power supply. I will be making a bunch more purchases soon!!!!UPDATE: Its 4 months after i put it up and still working beautiful. dosen't overheat (or heat up at all). Iris is in great shape and dosent quit!!!! love it

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" Sony Super HAD II CCD
Effective Pixels: 768 (H) x 494 (V)
650 TV Lines ;0.1 Lux @ F1.2; ELC AGC AWB BLC
DC Drive Lens; C or CS Mount Lens; 12V DC & 24V AC
8-100mm Vari-Focal Lens; 1/3" Auto Iris Mega Pixel Lens
ProductInfo.Name: HQ-Cam® Security Surveillance Box Camera - 650 TV Color Lines High Resolution 1/3" Sony Super HAD II CCD 8-100mm Lens Included Day Night CCTV Home Video Security Camera Outdoor/indoor
